'''Character Level-Up Materials''' are [[Character Development Item]]s used to ascend [[character]]s and upgrade their [[talent]]s. They can be dropped by [[boss]]es.

==Normal Boss Drops==
These materials are only dropped by a specific [[Normal Boss]] and are used for ascending to phase 2 and up.

==Weekly Boss Drops==
These materials only drop from their respective [[Weekly Boss]] and are used for upgrading [[talent]]s to Level 7 and up.
